title: Pentecost Sermon: Can you fabricate the Holy Spirit with sex, drugs and rock and roll?
description:
Rough draft to Sunday. Sunday is Pentecost. Can we talk about the Holy Spirit? Can we believe? 

Final Edition: https://youtu.be/ZVtY1KZ7DTM 

First Reformed Trailer https://youtu.be/wZ6xeRGCcLs
In the room with Paul Shrader https://youtu.be/djXCH30nmEI
Hearing Colors https://youtu.be/obrBAysVef0
Seeing Reality? https://youtu.be/oYp5XuGYqqY 
Matt Dillahunty https://youtu.be/FmH7JUeVQb8
